paper_abstract: This Mathemtica 6.0 package is it simulation of a Quantum Computer. The program provides a modular, instructive approach for generating the basic elements that make LIP a quantum) circuit. The main emphasis is Oil Using the density matrix, although an approach using state vectors is also implemented in the package. The package commands are defined in Qdensity.m which contains the tools needed in quantum circuits, e.g., multiqubit kets, projectors, gates, etc.
